title: I live in Kings Grant Subdivision at the back by the huge expanse of woods between us and Ogden/Gordon Road. At least twice a week, between 9 p.m. and 11:00 p.m. there is a pack of Coyotes running frenzied in back of our house chasing other animals. Is there anyway that New Hanover County can get rid of the Coyotes? They could be rabid and a danger to our children and the neighborhood domestic animals.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17204
